survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Meal Planning Apps Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and experiences with meal planning applications to help improve future app development and features.

questions.question_text: How often do you use a meal planning app?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for simplicity. Ensure the options cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use a meal planning app?

questions.question_text: Which features do you value the most in a meal planning app? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Recipe suggestions based on dietary preferences
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which features do you value the most in a meal planning app? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Recipe suggestions based on dietary preferences

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you do not use a meal planning app?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with an 'Other' option for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you do not use a meal planning app?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current meal planning app?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current meal planning app?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in meal planning apps?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to capture detailed feedback.
